item.title: EP 151 - The Ghost Who Solved Her Own Murder!
item.itunes:title: The Ghost Who Solved Her Own Murder!
item.description:
Today we look at a journalist who has a little too much insight into the mind of a serial killer, and then we go to Chicago to meet a ghost who solved her own murder!

 

MERCH STORE!!!

 

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer 

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

 

 

Links:

Journalist Turned Serial Killer – Vlado Taneski

https://morbidology.com/the-journalist-turned-serial-killer-vlado-taneski/

 

Did Teresita Basa Solve Her Own Murder?

https://morbidology.com/did-teresita-basa-solve-her-own-murder/

 

Teresita Basa Killed Today in 1977 - Did She Solve Her Own Murder?

http://www.chicagonow.com/chicago-history-cop/2015/02/teresita-basa-killed-today-in-1977-did-she-solve-her-own-murder/

 

THE VICTIM’S GHOST: DID TERESITA BASA SOLVE HER OWN MURDER?

https://anomalien.com/the-victims-ghost-did-teresita-basa-solve-her-own-murder/

 

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

 

------------------------------------------------

 

Logo Art By Ash Black

 

"As Above" Art By Grant Scott

 

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Music By Dr. Huxxxtable

 

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @JasonOCarpenter

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

 

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

 

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018
